block.p: BASEBALL American League BALTIMORE ORIOLES--Exercised their 2003 option of the contract of manager Mike Hargrove. Signed Mark Wiley, pitching coach, to a three-year contract. Announced Sam Perlozzo, third base coach, and Jeff Newman, bench coach, will switch roles for the 2001-02 season. OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Claimed RHP Marc Wilkins off waivers from the Pittsburgh Pirates. TEXAS RANGERS--Announced INF Tom Evans and C Randy Knorr declined their outright assignments to Oklahoma of the PCL and opted for free agency. National League ARIZONA DIAMONDBACKS--Signed RHP Kennie Steenstra and OF Chip Sell to minor league contracts. COLORADO ROCKIES--Announced the resignation of Mark Wiley, senior director of player personnel. HOUSTON ASTROS--Assigned RHP Rusty Meacham, RHP Brian Powell, LHP Jeromie Robertson, C Frank Charles, C Raul Chavez and INF Tripp Cromer outright to New Orleans of the PCL. Announced RHP Jason Green was claimed off waivers by the Colorado Rockies and INF Eddie Zosky cleared waivers and declared free agency. FLORIDA MARLINS--Announced the resignation of Eric Carington, director of media relations. Named Tim Whittle manager-finance. Eastern League TRENTON THUNDER--Named Eric Lipsman, executive director of marketing and merchandising, Chris Tobin, director of group sales, Josh Watson, director of stadium operations, Matt Armentano, assistant director of public and media relations, Dave Brown, merchandise manager, and Brian Cassidy, Rob McFadden and Matt Pentima, group sales assistants.

BASKETBALL National Basketball Association BOSTON CELTICS--Exercised their option on the contract of F Paul Pierce for the 2001-02 season. LOS ANGELES LAKERS--Signed C Shaquille O'Neal to a three-year contract extension. PORTLAND TRAIL BLAZERS--Released G Ime Udoka. International Basketball League IBL--Announced the resignation of George Blaney, vice president of basketball operations.

FOOTBALL National Football League CLEVELAND BROWNS--Signed LB Ryan Taylor from the practice squad. INDIANAPOLIS COLTS--Waived OL Josh Tucker from the practice squad. Signed WR Chad Plummer to the practice squad. NEW ORLEANS SAINTS--Placed DE Marques Douglas on injured reserve. Signed LB Corey Terry from the practice squad. SAN FRANCISCO 49ERS--Signed LB Edward Thomas from the practice squad.

HOCKEY National Hockey League NHL--Suspended St. Louis Blues D Chris Pronger for one game for leaving the bench and becoming involved in a fight during a game on Oct. 11. CALGARY FLAMES--Added D Steve Smith to the roster. CHICAGO BLACKHAWKS--Assigned F Blair Atcheynum to Norfolk in the AHL. DALLAS STARS--Assigned C Greg Leeb to Utah of the IHL. PHOENIX COYOTES--Signed C Trevor Letowski. Assigned LW Brad Ralph to Springfield of the AHL. SAN JOSE SHARKS--Recalled G Miikka Kiprusoff from Kentucky of the AHL. American Hockey League HARTFORD WOLF PACK--Acquired D Dale Purinton on conditioning loan from the New York Rangers. KENTUCKY THOROUGHBLADES--Acquired G Terry Friesen from Fresno of the WCHL. LOUISVILLE PANTHERS--Acquired D John Jakopin on conditioning loan from the Florida Panthers. ROCHESTER AMERICANS--Loaned G Kirk Daubenspeck to South Carolina of the ECHL. East Coast Hockey League AUGUSTA LYNX--Added RW Ken Tasker. Placed C Jason Shipulski on 7-day injured reserve. CHARLOTTE CHECKERS--Signed F Mathieu Benoit and F Brad Mehalko. Placed D Bob Macisaac on 7-day injured reserve. GREENSBORO GENERALS--Placed LW Jason Windle on 7-day injured reserve. Signed D Bob Halkidis. LOUISIANA ICEGATORS--Placed LW Mike Kucsulain on 30-day injured reserve. WHEELING NAILERS--Waived F Martin Duval. Signed F Boris Protsenko. United Hockey League MOHAWK VALLEY PROWLERS--Acquired RW Jay Mazur from New Haven for C John Vecchiarelli.
